channel.title: Coalscape's client is finally here!
channel.description:
THIS IS MY FIRST CLIENT EVER! I AM SO HAPPY! :cool:[color=orange]COALSCAPE'S CLIENT HAS FINALLY ARRIVED!THE DOWNLOAD LINK IS [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?n2wgiagnfoz]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mgz1zkzz1mm[/url] .BUT YOU DO NEED winRAR DO BE ABLE TO RUN AND EXTRACT THE FILE BUT LATER ON TODAY I AM GOING TO TRY AND MAKE IT A FOLDER DOWNLOAD INSTEAD OF A winRAR :) Hope you love it 8)
100% no viruses! I would show a picture but my ani virus program (not telling name),once it is done scanning unless there is a virus it just closes.It is a really good program and it removes my trogens so as you can see there is no viruses!
Credits: 30% to me 30% to the owner of Butterscape 40% to the creators of Butterscape's client
[color=blue]Mediafire [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mgz1zkzz1mm]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mgz1zkzz1mm[/url] [color=red]Mega Upload [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=ATW82OHZ]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=ATW82OHZ[/url]
[color=orange]~Coal~
PS:It has a few nulls and 1 shop doesn't work (helmet shop) but other than that it is alsome!It doesn't lag much with it and it has alot of costum items on it.When you download it go in item dump and there ya go.Here are 2 names of 2 items......a pink whip named Pimpz whip and a blue waraxe named Butters waraxe

item.title: Coalscape's client is finally here!
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

/fail. K, not to be mean… but if you don’t know how to take a screenshot then you obviously can’t code too well. Explain your client… all you said was that it’s finally here and what do you mean finally? was every1 waiting for this “exciting release”? And also if you are writing a thread, use proper language and not fonts as big as hell… IMO, this sucks. Sorry, but you need to do more things. I’m not even convinced you have done anything. But GL next time :P, hope you understand.

Read full topic
